The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen and ancient race: The half-African/Bantu and possible South African/African-American alien creatures kidnaps people to vivisect, hence the name of the group’s name.
This interesting film was made available by Umbrella Entertainment .

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
Definitely not worth to watch.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many characteristics from other better Ninja and Karate films such as Big trouble in Little China, and it is acted like a Schwarzenegger vehicle with low budget effects .
